values: 流；小河；流动；水流；一系列；队列；潮流；一股；一束；一缕；源源不断的事情
流；流动；涌动；流出；喷涌；流淌；播放（视频或音频）；传输（数据）；使连续不断地传送；按特定顺序排列

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指水或其它液体从源头流出，不断地朝某一方向流动，可用作引申。
通常指从高向低或从上向下的急剧流动。也可作引申用。
侧重水继续不断地往前流，不关心其流量的大小和速度的快慢。
指液体向任何方向流动，暗示比flow快而有力。
泛指大小河流，也可专指小溪。
指小河，尤指发源于山泉的小河。

word_group.brief_definition: 在生产；投入生产；存在；出现
随波逐流；顺应潮流；随大流
不随波逐流；不顺应潮流；不随大流
稳定流；平稳的溪流；平稳流
收入流；收益流；收入源流
络绎不绝；连续不断；川流不息
流淌的溪流；流动的小溪

bilingual.source: The video stream uses cbr to maintain consistent quality.
bilingual.target: 视频流使用常规比特率来保持一致的质量。
叶子顺着小溪向下漂流。

bilingual.source: Tears began to stream down her face.
bilingual.target: 眼泪开始顺着她的脸颊流动。

bilingual.source: You can stream HBO on multiple devices.
bilingual.target: 你可以在多个设备上流媒体播放HBO（HomeBox Office，美国有线电视网络媒体公司）。

bilingual.source: The stream's flow wash away the stones.
bilingual.target: 小溪的水流冲刷着石头。

bilingual.source: The stream's water made a tinkle sound.
bilingual.target: 小溪的水流发出叮咚的声音。

bilingual.source: The trickle in the stream flows slowly.
bilingual.target: 小溪中的细流缓缓流动。

bilingual.source: A small stream flows through the meadow.

list.abstract: Stream泛指流媒体技术。流媒体实际指的是一种新的媒体传送方式，而非一种新的媒体，是指采用流式传输的方式在Internet播放的媒体格式。可指大河，也可指小河或小溪，指小溪时与brook,creek同义。creek侧重其狭长蜿蜒，缓缓流动，且多流入大河或湖泊。brook侧重发源于山泉。creek和stream都比brook大。stream还可引申表示事物连绵不断。stream还可作动词，意为“流动，飘动”。常用作不及物动词，也可用作及物动词。

yingyinNormal.en: We just, met at the newsstand. We both grabbed for the last Field & Stream. What? I read that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们刚刚在报摊认识，我们都买了《原野与河流》（著名的狩猎和钓鱼杂志），怎么了，我一直在看啊。

yingyinNormal.en: But he has no idea what an idiot you are! Is this merely stream-of-consciousness abuse, or are you attempting to make a point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他不知道你有多蠢！你是在意识流地诛心，还是想表达什么观点？

yingyinNormal.en: Row, row, row your boat, gently down the stream. If you see a crocodile, don't forget to scream. Picnic spot. Everybody off. Thank you Grampy Rabbit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 划，划，划你的船，在河流里轻轻的划。如果你看见一个鳄鱼，不要忘记了大叫哇！野餐区，大家下船。谢谢兔爷爷。

yingyinNormal.en: And you've made your initial decision into a stream of decisions and into a habit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最初的那个决定影响了此后你一连串的决定，最终它成为你的一个习惯。

yingyinNormal.en: This one comes with music and flowers. Oh, they even stream the whole thing live on the Internet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这套餐有音乐跟鲜花呢，而且还能在网上直播我们的婚礼。

yingyinNormal.en: For future reference, if I want to watch Mean Girls, I'll stream it on Netflix. We're sorry. What do you need?
yingyinNormal.zh: 以后如果我想看《贱女孩》这部片我会直接去网上看。抱歉啦，你找我们干嘛？

yingyinNormal.en: You have to just let nature take its course, just like this webcam I've been watching. It's a live stream of wild otters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还是让他顺应自然成长吧，就像我最近在网络直播上看到的那样，现在在直播一群野生水獭。

yingyinNormal.en: They all converge at America's busiest commuter hub, New York's Penn station, while only a few blocks away, trains from the north stream into another bustling train station, grand central terminal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们都在上班一族的中心点——拥聚一堂纽约的宾州车站就在几个街区以外,北方来的火车开向另外一个繁忙的车站纽约中央车站。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 溪流; 水流; 流出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 流大量鼻涕和眼泪的；流式的；流式传输的

word_family.mean: n. 小河；小溪；流；股；缕；数据流；指令流；能力小组；一连串

sense_info_list.en: a large number of things that happen or come one after the other

sense_info_list.zh: 溪流; 水流; 流出

sense_info_list.en: play video or sound on a computer by receiving it as a continuous stream, from the Internet for example, rather than needing to wait until the whole of the material has been downloaded

exam_freq_info.chinese: 溪流; 水流; 流出
蜂拥; 川流不息; 人流; 车流

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 流大量鼻涕和眼泪的；流式的；流式传输的

word_family.mean: n. 小河；小溪；流；股；缕；数据流；指令流；能力小组；一连串

sense_info_list.zh: 溪流; 水流; 流出

examination_example.sentence: There was no electricity, and our water supply was a nearby <highlight>stream</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的水源就是附近的一条小溪。

examination_example.sentence: The existence of new revenue <highlight>streams</highlight> for some but not all councils is complicated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于一些而非所有的议会来说，新收入来源的存在是复杂的。

examination_example.sentence: All the lagoons join when the lake is high and fish must retreat to their <highlight>stream</highlight> refuges or die.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当湖面很高时，所有的泻湖都会汇合在一起，鱼必须撤退到它们的溪流避难所，否则就会死亡。

sense_info_list.en: play video or sound on a computer by receiving it as a continuous stream, from the Internet for example, rather than needing to wait until the whole of the material has been downloaded

examination_example.sentence: There is a direct connection from Marconi to today's social media, search engines, and program <highlight>streaming</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi与当今的社交媒体、搜索引擎和节目流媒体播放有着直接的联系。

examination_example.sentence: My brother also introduced me to some videos of someone that <highlight>streams</highlight> the game online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我哥哥还向我介绍了一些在线观看游戏的视频。

examination_example.sentence: The robots also allow engineers and farmers to analyze optimize the attributes of the robot, as well as provide a live <highlight>stream</highlight> giving real-time feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些机器人还允许工程师和农民分析优化机器人的属性，并提供实时反馈的实时流。

examination_example.sentence: We're served up an endless <highlight>stream</highlight> of advice on "how to survive your 40s".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们源源不断地收到了关于“如何度过40多岁”的建议。

examination_example.sentence: A steady <highlight>stream</highlight> of similar headlines accuse the Net and its offspring apps, social media sites of addicting us to distraction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 类似的标题源源不断地指责网络及其衍生应用、社交媒体网站让我们沉迷分心。

sense_info_list.en:
move somewhere in large numbers, one after the other
a continuous flow of people or vehicles
sense_info_list.zh: 蜂拥; 川流不息; 人流; 车流

examination_example.sentence: Since he began to informally announce the network at farming conferences and on social media, he's received a steady <highlight>stream</highlight> of inquiries from interested farmers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从他开始在农业会议和社交媒体上非正式公开宣布该网络以来，他不断收到来自感兴趣的农户的询问。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 溪流; 水流; 流出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 流大量鼻涕和眼泪的；流式的；流式传输的

word_family.mean: n. 小河；小溪；流；股；缕；数据流；指令流；能力小组；一连串

sense_info_list.zh: 溪流; 水流; 流出

examination_example.sentence: The land has been connected to the network of lakes and <highlight>streams</highlight> in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这片陆地与该地区的湖泊和溪流相连。

sense_info_list.en: a large number of things that happen or come one after the other
play video or sound on a computer by receiving it as a continuous stream; from the Internet for example; rather than needing to wait until the whole of the material has been downloaded

examination_example.sentence: Everybody's television set is connected to a system that <highlight>streams</highlight> personalized language or exercise classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人的电视机都连接着一个系统，可以播放个性化的语言或锻炼课程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 溪流; 水流; 流出
蜂拥; 川流不息; 人流; 车流

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 溪流; 水流; 流出

examination_example.sentence: If it were not stopped, that long train, full of passengers, would fall into the <highlight>stream</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不停下来，那列满载乘客的长火车就会掉入河里。

sense_info_list.en: move somewhere in large numbers, one after the other; a continuous flow of people or vehicles
sense_info_list.zh: 蜂拥; 川流不息; 人流; 车流

examination_example.sentence: The wall is 12 meters high and from here you can see <highlight>streams</highlight> of people moving inside and outside the City Wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 城墙有12米高，从这里可以看到城墙内外川流不息的人群。

examination_example.sentence: The electronic waste <highlight>stream</highlight> is increasing three times faster than traditional garbage as a whole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的来说，电子垃圾的增长速度是传统垃圾的三倍。

examination_example.sentence: Sam is an in-real-life streamer, and he live <highlight>streams</highlight> himself just going about his day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 山姆是一名现实生活中的主播，他每天都在直播自己的生活。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 溪流; 水流; 流出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 溪流; 水流; 流出

examination_example.sentence: Ancient artists enjoyed performing by a <highlight>stream</highlight> in the mountains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古代的艺术家喜欢在山涧溪流边演奏。

examination_example.sentence: A river is a flowing（流动的）, moving <highlight>stream</highlight> of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 河流是流动的水流。

examination_example.sentence: In recent years, she has made shadow puppets based on some cartoon series and given a live <highlight>streaming</highlight> performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，她根据一些卡通系列制作了皮影戏，并进行了现场流媒体表演。

examination_example.sentence: Whose live-<highlight>streaming</highlight> room will you go if you want to buy a Hai'er fridge?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想买海尔冰箱，你会去谁的直播间?

examination_example.sentence: Drones can become flyaways, and can be caught up on a jet <highlight>stream</highlight> (喷气流) and blown away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无人驾驶飞机可能会失去控制飞走，可能会被急流卷入并被吹走。

examination_example.sentence: The machine would breathe in the air in front of the bike and blow out a <highlight>stream</highlight> of clean air toward the biker.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器会吸入自行车前方的空气，然后向骑自行车的人吹出一股干净的气流。
